scripts.build-deploy:prepare: concurrently 'npm run build:jade'  'npm run build:styles' 'npm run build:scripts'
scripts.build:prepare: concurrently 'npm run build:images' 'npm run build:jade' 'npm run build:styles' 'npm run build:scripts'
scripts.build:styles: npm run build:styles:compile && npm run build:styles:prefix
scripts.build:styles:prefix: (cd _styles/unprefixed && for file in *.css; do (autoprefixer-cli -b 'ie >= 9, > 1%, last 2 versions, ios >= 7' < $file   | csso > ../../css/$file); done)
scripts.build:scripts: npm run build:scripts:compile && npm run build:scripts:uglify
scripts.build:scripts:uglify: (cd _scripts/js && for file in *.js; do ( uglifyjs -c -m -o ../../js/$file $file); done)
scripts.build:images:posts: POSTS_CHECKSUM_NOW=$(md5sum img/_posts/*.jpg | md5sum); POSTS_CHECKSUM_SAVED=$(cat img/_posts/.checksum); if [ "$POSTS_CHECKSUM_NOW" = "$POSTS_CHECKSUM_SAVED" ] ; then echo 'Posts images unchanged'; else npm run build:images:posts:generate ; fi
scripts.build:images:posts:generate: concurrently 'npm run build:images:posts200px' 'npm run build:images:posts300px' 'npm run build:images:posts400px'
scripts.build:images:posts200px: (cd img/_posts && for file in *.jpg; do (mogrify -path ../posts200 -filter Triangle -define filter:support=2 -resize 200x150^ -extent 200x150 -gravity Center -unsharp 0.25x0.08+8.3+0.045 -dither None -posterize 136 -quality 82 $file); done)
scripts.build:images:posts300px: (cd img/_posts && for file in *.jpg; do (mogrify -path ../posts300 -filter Triangle -define filter:support=2 -resize 300x225^ -extent 300x225 -gravity Center -unsharp 0.25x0.08+8.3+0.045 -dither None -posterize 136 -quality 82 $file); done)
scripts.build:images:posts400px: (cd img/_posts && for file in *.jpg; do (mogrify -path ../posts400 -filter Triangle -define filter:support=2 -resize 400x300^ -extent 400x300 -gravity Center -unsharp 0.25x0.08+8.3+0.045 -dither None -posterize 136 -quality 82 $file); done)
scripts.postbuild:images:posts:generate: md5sum img/_posts/*.jpg | md5sum > img/_posts/.checksum && echo 'posts images ready'
scripts.build:images:tours: TOURS_CHECKSUM_NOW=$(md5sum img/_tours/*.jpg | md5sum); TOURS_CHECKSUM_SAVED=$(cat img/_tours/.checksum); if [ "$TOURS_CHECKSUM_NOW" = "$TOURS_CHECKSUM_SAVED" ] ; then echo 'Tours images unchanged'; else npm run build:images:tours:generate ; fi
scripts.build:images:tours:generate: concurrently 'npm run build:images:tours300px' 'npm run build:images:tours400px' 'npm run build:images:tours600px' 'npm run build:images:tours800px'
scripts.build:images:tours300px: (cd img/_tours && for file in *.jpg; do (mogrify -path ../tours300 -filter Triangle -define filter:support=2 -resize 300x225^ -extent 300x225 -gravity Center -unsharp 0.25x0.08+8.3+0.045 -dither None -posterize 136 -quality 82 $file); done)
scripts.build:images:tours400px: (cd img/_tours && for file in *.jpg; do (mogrify -path ../tours400 -filter Triangle -define filter:support=2 -resize 400x300^ -extent 400x300 -gravity Center -unsharp 0.25x0.08+8.3+0.045 -dither None -posterize 136 -quality 82 $file); done)
scripts.build:images:tours600px: (cd img/_tours && for file in *.jpg; do (mogrify -path ../tours600 -filter Triangle -define filter:support=2 -resize 600x450^ -extent 600x450 -gravity Center -unsharp 0.25x0.08+8.3+0.045 -dither None -posterize 136 -quality 82 $file); done)
scripts.build:images:tours800px: (cd img/_tours && for file in *.jpg; do (mogrify -path ../tours800 -filter Triangle -define filter:support=2 -resize 800x600^ -extent 800x600 -gravity Center -unsharp 0.25x0.08+8.3+0.045 -dither None -posterize 136 -quality 82 $file); done)
scripts.postbuild:images:tours:generate: md5sum img/_tours/*.jpg | md5sum > img/_tours/.checksum && echo 'tours images ready'
scripts.watch: concurrently 'npm run watch:jekyll -s' 'npm run watch:jade -s' 'npm run watch:styles' 'npm run watch:scripts' 'npm run browser-sync'
scripts.justbuild: npm run build:jade && npm run build:styles && npm run build:scripts && npm run build:jekyll
scripts.predeploy: npm run data-update && npm run build
